channel.title: Entrix 317
channel.description:
[center][CENTER][IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2lu4ard.png[/img][/CENTER]
[size=30pt][u][b] FEATURES[/b][/u][/size]
[CENTER] ALL SKILLS WORK. - INCLUDING DUNG/FARMING AND SUMMONING. 100% Nex boss 100% Vorago boss Faction - really cool feature - which involves special content to whoever is a faction member - such as world wide monster counts and rewards. Great rewards for voting daily Well designed interfaces Tons of dungeons (all working ofcourse) including Polypore and more XP Lamp which gives you over 30k xp (great interface) Max Cape Mature and respectful staff team. (some positions are currently open) All shops required fully organized Great PKing Perfect Switching No lag whatsoever Up 24/7 - Hosted on a [U][B]DEDI[/B][/U] Bank Tabs Awesome Combat System with amazing hit splashes Unique Account Security Safe Zone PKing - such as Varrock/FunPK/Mage Back Fun Minigames - such as Duel Arena and so on Great Clan Chat System [b]LOADS MORE.[/b] [/CENTER]
[size=30pt][u][b] WHAT WE'RE WORKING ON[/b][/u][/size]
[CENTER] [ul][*]Loyalty System - each hour you spend online - you will be awarded with 50 loyalty points. [*]Money Pouch [*]Tasks to do - EASY - MEDIUM - HARD [*]POS - as in Player Owned Store. Where users can buy or either sell any items.[/ul]
[/CENTER]
[size=30pt][u][b]MEDIA[/b][/u][/size]
[CENTER]Where you start off - talk to the beginner guide so you can be able to start your Entrix adventure. [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/jts8pj.jpg[/img]
Home area with ofcourse all the necessary shops around. [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/r255jm.png[/img]
Faction Leader - [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/9r600j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2eg9wuh.png[/img]
Fully working XP Lamp [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/155rjvd.png[/img]
Outfit shop - fit for the noobies who want to look smexi when chillin'. [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/5y5dgx.png[/img]
PKing Point Shop [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/2lb0pq8.png[/img]
Skills Teleport [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/14xm8gh.png[/img]
Monster Teleport [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/30bleg6.png[/img]
Training [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/5odqvd.png[/img]
Pest Control [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/16jev6c.png[/img]
Pest Control Shop w/ points [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/nmbw4p.jpg[/img]
Duel Arena [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/rlfczk.png[/img][/CENTER]
[center][size=30pt][size=18pt][b][u]LINKS[/u][/b][/size]
[size=21pt][center][b]OFFICIAL WEBSITE[/b][/center] [url=http://entrixps.com/]http://entrixps.com/[/url]
[size=21pt][center][b]FORUM[/b][/center] [url=http://entrixps.com/forums/index.php?/]http://entrixps.com/forums/index.php?/[/url][/center]
[size=21pt][center][b]CLIENT DOWNLOAD[/b][/center] [url=http://entrixps.com/317/Entrix.jar]http://entrixps.com/317/Entrix.jar[/url]
[SIZE=3]We are willing to code any logical suggestion. We listen to the community [U]in every way whatsoever[/U] and we will be hosting community involvement events like quest creation and even more. STAY TUNED! [/SIZE][/center]
[center][u][b][size=36pt]WE HOPE TO SEE YOU.[/size][/b][/u] :)[/center]

item.title: Entrix 317
item.dc:creator: @iTz_Liam iTz Liam
item.description:
@iTz_Liam wrote:

[center][CENTER][/CENTER]

[size=30pt]
FEATURES[/size]

[CENTER]
ALL SKILLS WORK. - INCLUDING DUNG/FARMING AND SUMMONING.
100% Nex boss
100% Vorago boss
Faction - really cool feature - which involves special content to whoever is a faction member - such as world wide monster counts and rewards.
Great rewards for voting daily
Well designed interfaces
Tons of dungeons (all working ofcourse) including Polypore and more
XP Lamp which gives you over 30k xp (great interface)
Max Cape
Mature and respectful staff team. (some positions are currently open)
All shops required fully organized
Great PKing
Perfect Switching
No lag whatsoever
Up 24/7 - Hosted on a DEDI
Bank Tabs
Awesome Combat System with amazing hit splashes
Unique Account Security
Safe Zone PKing - such as Varrock/FunPK/Mage Back
Fun Minigames - such as Duel Arena and so on
Great Clan Chat System
LOADS MORE.
[/CENTER]

[size=30pt]
WHAT WE’RE WORKING ON[/size]

[CENTER]
[ul][]Loyalty System - each hour you spend online - you will be awarded with 50 loyalty points.
[]Money Pouch
[]Tasks to do - EASY - MEDIUM - HARD
[]POS - as in Player Owned Store. Where users can buy or either sell any items.[/ul]

[/CENTER]

[size=30pt]MEDIA[/size]

[CENTER]Where you start off - talk to the beginner guide so you can be able to start your Entrix adventure.
